1.goodChoiceIf: You want to know how often you experience symptoms (or pursue treatment)

1.subgoalName: Learn what factors may contribute to symmptoms
1.goodChoiceIf: You want to identify potential contributors ("triggers")

1.subgoalName: Learn whether a specific change affects symptoms
1.goodChoiceIf: You are making a specific change (like starting a new treatment or eliminating a potential contributor) and want to see how it affects your symptoms

3.goodChoiceIf: You want to keep track of symptom frequency for your own knowledge
Your doctor wants more detailed symptom or treatment information
Your insurance needs more detailed symptom information to cover your prescription
